title: Cannot preview my efax
content:
I use an efax service for my work. I like to preview my faxes before they get sent out, just in case. However, when I click to preview in my fax queue, a blank window briefly pops up, then disappears, and I cannot preview my fax.

I've tried clearing my cache, but that didn't fix the issue. I've paused my anti-virus tracking protection on that site, too.

I can preview my fax when using MS Edge, so I think the problem is with Firefox. And I'd rather chew off my fingers that use MS Edge on a regular basis, especially just for this one thing.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

title: Mais duas atualizações em menos de cinco dias, piora drástica no navegador, lentidão, travamento e...
content: Pela primeira vez cheguei a marca de 3h de espera para acessar um site qualquer, e o site é este. Detalhe é que eu esperei por mais de 3h e assim que a página abriu, o Mozilla Firefox automaticamente FECHOU E ABRIU NOVAMENTE. Só que, assim que o Mozilla Firefox foi aberto novamente e automaticamente, na mesma página de SUPORTE DO MOZILLA, abriram mais de 50 páginas. Sim, eu não pedi nada, pra abrir nada, nada acontece, horroroso, horrível, o que vocês fazem com a experiência do usuário em forma de retaliação, é bizarro, é criminoso. O que os funcionários do Mozilla Firefox fazem comigo é CRIME, sim, CRIME! A partir dessa semana estarei com três técnicos em análise e farei laudos contra a empresa, COMEÇA AGORA NOSSA GUERRA DE VERDADE! Vocês ganharam as batalhas de vocês, suas atualizações destruíram meu computador, me fizeram quebrar um celular, um monitor, uma porrada de copo, de controle de video game, perdi uma televisão, tudo por raiva...e sim, tudo será cobrado muito bem! Hoje começa o inferno de vocês e estou garantindo isso! Acabou a paz! TRÊS HORAS PRA ABRIR ESTE SITE! Um computador i7 16GB, vão ter que bater de frente severamente contra isso! E vou provar que vocês estão dentro da minha rede, mexendo no meu computador, minerando criptomoeda, pegando minhas senhas, acessando minhas contas. Meus antivirus e o windows defender nao detectam nada e meu unico problema é COM VOCÊS DO MOZILLA. A GUERRA SÓ COMEÇOU! Podem me banir, podem tudo, tudo está registrado em e-mail, está tudo aqui, deste site de suporte, do site de ideias, tudo. Quiseram me fazer cometer um ato de suicidio me atacando através disso? Agora eu vou sorrir e limpar a bunda com o dinheiro de vocês, vagabundos de merda! ACABOU A PAZ! COMEÇOU A GUERRA! ESSA GUERRA É JURIDICA E VOCÊS FRACASSARÃO!

title: Labels that are required in our Google Drive environment show as "Couldn't load labels. Try again." but work in private window
content: This issue only occurs for users using Firefox. When creating a document in our company's Google Drive environment there is a required Data Classification label that must be applied to documents and users are prompted with "To comply with policies, fill in missing fields.Fill in required fields." but when they click to apply the label the labels fail to load and they receive "Couldn't load labels. Try again." This only happens in Firefox, no other browser, but works in a Firefox private window. A fresh install of Firefox vs one that has add-ons or customization behaves the same. I'm sure it's just some setting that needs to be changed but we've been unable to figure out what tweak is needed.
creator: dawn.bowles

title: Profiles switching settings between machines
content:
Dear Firefox,

I am a college student working in an office. I have a work computer, and a home computer and would like for my browsing history, bookmarks, and customization to remain separate between the two computers. It appears that Firefox's profiles is intended to do this, but it keeps freaking out on me. On my home computer I have a default profile called Connor Home with its own settings, and on my work computer I have a default profile called Connor Work with its own settings. However, it appears that whenever I use Firefox on my work computer, it overwrites all the settings from my Connor Work profile onto my Connor Home profile, as when I return home, all of my home settings and bookmarks have been replaced with my work settings and bookmarks. Upon checking, I see that I am still in my Connor Home on my home computer, and I am still in Connor Work on my work computer. Why does changing the settings in one of my profiles seem to overwrite my other profile? Please help.

title: FORM|RADIO BUTTON|Checked Option does not work in v107.0.1 (Linux)
content:
In this form

<form action="submit3.sh" method="get" style="margin-top:-1.1em;" > <fieldset> <legend>Odroid C4:</legend> 

               <input type="hidden" name="engine" value="chess1">

<label for="option">chess1</label> : <input type="radio" id="c1o" name="chess1" value="on" $chc1on />ON <input type="radio" id="c1f" name="chess1" value="off" $chc1off />OFF 

               <input type="hidden" name="engine" value="chess2">

<label for="option">chess2</label> : <input type="radio" id="c2o" name="chess2" value="on" checked />ON <input type="radio" id="c2f" name="chess2" value="off" />OFF

</fieldset> 

               <button type="submit" style="margin-left:0;padding-left:5;background-color:#e6faff;font-size:1.0em;font-weight:400;FONT-FAMILY:'ubuntu', sans;">submit </button> 
               
                </form>

the checked option does not work. In Chromium it worked. This costed me more than 1 hour because I could not believe that this does not work in Firefox.

Best regards Gerald

title: Bookmark function in version 108.0.1
content: I have been using Firefox for at least 15 years. And I have contributed what I could periodically to support such a useful App. Dragging and dropping Tabs into bookmark folders in a "Library" window and rearranging the order of bookmarks in and between folders in the "Library" window, also by dragging and dropping, were one of Firefox's most useful features. UP UNTIL VERSION 108. What have you done to the library??!! I have a research library of over 4MB of links in the library which took over a decade to accumulate and organize. With this version (108.0.1) NO LINKS CAN BE ADDED, REMOVED OR REORGANIZED BY DRAGGING & DROPPING. If someone at Mozilla thinks this is a good idea, then I'll have to abandon Firefox permanently. THIS IS NO LONGER A USABLE BROWSER WITHOUT A FUNCTIONING LIBRARY.
creator: edmooresjs

title: Firefox hangs when trying to save file that already exists
content:
Firefox seems to hang almost indefinitely when you are

  • saving a file that already exists.
  • While multiple other files are downloading at the same time (around 20 file downloads)

My system is

  • Running Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Running GNOME on Wayland
  • Using Nautilus as the File Manager

After the number of simultaneous downloads reaches around 5, it responds again with a dialog that says that a file with that name already exists.

I am running a Ryzen 9 5950x and the CPU utilization is only at 2% so I am wondering why it needs to hang for so long?

title: Firefox freezing Windows 10 (64) Apps on desktop computer.
content:
Using FIREFOX V. 107 on a Windows 10 desktop computer with 32 GB memory.

Dec 18, 2022 With Firefox running in the background while using other apps, they suddenly become unresponsive. I found I can fix this by going to Task Manager, clicking on Firefox then a dozen or more processe open. Clicking on and deleting the smallest one, about 3MB, gets me back up and running. This happens even with no add-ons.

THIS WAS NEVER A PROBLEM WITH OLDER VERSIONS (V100 or before)

If you can't fix this, please make go back to a version which worked. The memory leaks/bloat are a disaster.

DON'T IGNORE THIS ISSUE. IT IS A DAMN NUISANCE !!!

Thanks.
creator: mstager
